txt.en: Orc-kind have taken over the Glimmerdeep and work to mine its wealth. The scaffolding they have built allows the miners to scale to unreachable sections of the mine, and must be destroyed. If enough scaffolding is weakened, it may eventually collapse under its own weight.
You have weakened much of the Orkish scaffolding in the Glimmerdeep and successfully helped to hinder the mining operation.
Orc-kind have claimed the Glimmerdeep and work to mine its wealth.
You should weaken Orkish scaffolding in Glimmerdeep mine.
